resources.string: No commercial value, coupon redemption is at the discretion of the business.
When you are at Craw Station dining with friends, picking up an order,
having a beer or visiting one of our friendly wait staff, start this app to check-in.
You can unlock rewards just by dropping in.
Thank you for visiting Craw Station. Would you like to check in?
To use coupon, tap the coupon and show your server when ordering so it can be applied to your check.
Only one coupon per visit per group can be used.
Spend $20 or more to get free potatoes fries!
Spend $35 or more to get free desert!
XX more check-ins to activate next coupon!.
